original: @60a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @60a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajravidāraṇa.

original: byis pa'i gdon las thar par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sngon du srin mo nam gru'i cho 'brang bton te gtor ma sbyin /
analyzed: byis pa'i gdon las thar par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sngon du srin mo nam gru'i cho 'brang bton te gtor ma sbyin /
translated: A practitioner who is endowed with the commitments and who wishes to liberate a child from a spirit affliction should first recite the lineage of the rākṣasī Nāḍī and give a torma.

original: 'bras kyi 'o thug dang / kris ra dang / 'bras chan mon sran gre'u sbyar ba dang / bu ram dang / 'o ma dang / nya dang / sha dang / til dang / chang dang / 'gron bu dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dur khrod du byin na byis pa'i gdon srung ba dang mi nad chen po rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras kyi 'o thug dang / kris ra dang / 'bras chan mon sran gre'u sbyar ba dang / bu ram dang / 'o ma dang / nya dang / sha dang / til dang / chang dang / 'gron bu dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dur khrod du byin na byis pa'i gdon srung ba dang mi nad chen po rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one gives a torma of rice milk, rice, peas, rice boiled with lentils, molasses, milk, fish, meat, sesame, beer, cowries, and various fragrances and flowers in a charnel ground, it will protect a child from spirit afflictions and pacify great human illnesses.🔽Having made offerings of excellent food and so on to Vajrapāṇi and his retinue, one should read the tantra as much as possible.

original: 'di dag gis bshos gtsang ma la sogs pa badzra p'a ni 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod cing rgyud rdzogs par ci rigs par bklag / de nas srin mo chen mo nam gru'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te /
analyzed: 'di dag gis bshos gtsang ma la sogs pa badzra p'a ni 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod cing rgyud rdzogs par ci rigs par bklag / de nas srin mo chen mo nam gru'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te /
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of the great rākṣasī Nāḍī, one should recite her essence mantra.

original: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis tshigs mar bkug //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis tshigs mar bkug //
translated: Make a fist with both hands, with the two index fingers bent at the first joint.

original: gung mo gnyis gshibs te /
analyzed: gung mo gnyis gshibs te /
translated: Place the two middle fingers together,

original: bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo gzugs te /
analyzed: bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo gzugs te /
translated: with the index fingers placed at the first joint,

original: mthe bong gnyis bsgreng bar byas la /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis bsgreng bar byas la /
translated: and raise the two thumbs.

original: na mo badzra p'a ni bya tsi li tsi li bhinti bhinta /
analyzed: na mo badzra p'a ni bya tsi li tsi li bhinti bhinta /
translated: Recite: “Oṃ namo vajrapāṇi vyācili vyācili bhinna bhinna

original: munytsa munytsa / hi b'a la kan sv'a h'a /
analyzed: munytsa munytsa / hi b'a la kan sv'a h'a /
translated: muñca muñca hī balakan svāhā.

original: badzra p'a ni r'adzny'i pa ya ti sv'a h'a /🔽de bas man r'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: badzra p'a ni r'adzny'i pa ya ti sv'a h'a / de bas man r'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
translated: Vajrapāṇi rājñāpiyāti svāhā.🔽Devas rājñāpiyāti svāhā.🔽Rṣaya rājñāpiyāti svāhā.”

original: ri sha ya sa ma r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a zhes @60b gser dang / lung tang dang / dzi ba lig bu mig dang / gi wang dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / shu dag dang / ngan dang / grog la cho 'brang dang /
analyzed: ri sha ya sa ma r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a zhes @60b gser dang / lung tang dang / dzi ba lig bu mig dang / gi wang dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / shu dag dang / ngan dang / grog la cho 'brang dang /
translated: Then, with gold, turmeric, jīvaka, rocana, ghee, honey, śigru, śleṣmātaka, and ant hill soil,

original: rig sngags bris par ras sngon po'i nang du dril ba dang / skud pa sngon po la mdud ba bor ba rnams kyis byis pa'i mgul du btags na byis pa nges par gdon gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar nges so //
analyzed: rig sngags bris par ras sngon po'i nang du dril ba dang / skud pa sngon po la mdud ba bor ba rnams kyis byis pa'i mgul du btags na byis pa nges par gdon gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar nges so //
translated: If one ties a blue thread around the neck of a child, or ties a knot in a blue thread, and writes the vidya-mantra on a piece of blue cloth, and ties it around the child's neck, it is certain that the child will not come under the influence of demons.🔽The praise by mentioning the lineage of Namdru

original: nam gru'i cho 'brang smos pas bstod pa ni /🔽nor bu'i rang bzhin 'od kyi lus //
analyzed: nam gru'i cho 'brang smos pas bstod pa ni / nor bu'i rang bzhin 'od kyi lus //
translated: :🔽Your body is of the nature of a jewel,

original: rgyan ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser //
analyzed: rgyan ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser //
translated: Your ornaments are of the gold of the Jambu River,

original: khyod kyi gdong yang dngul yin te //
analyzed: khyod kyi gdong yang dngul yin te //
translated: Your face is of silver,

original: lte ba'i ngos ni rdo rje mkhregs //
analyzed: lte ba'i ngos ni rdo rje mkhregs //
translated: And your navel is hard as a diamond.

original: ming po mdzod dang mdzod srung gnyis ;
analyzed: ming po mdzod dang mdzod srung gnyis ;
translated: Your two brothers are the treasury and the treasury guard,

original: / khyod kyi ming ni kun grol ma //
analyzed: / khyod kyi ming ni kun grol ma //
translated: Your name is Kun-drol-ma,

original: khyod kyi pha ni rlu nga zhes bya //
analyzed: khyod kyi pha ni rlu nga zhes bya //
translated: Your father is called Lu-nga,

original: b'a gi ra thi khyod kyi rus //
analyzed: b'a gi ra thi khyod kyi rus //
translated: And your clan is Vagiratha.

original: lha yul dag tu grags pa yin //
analyzed: lha yul dag tu grags pa yin //
translated: You are famous in the land of the gods.

original: zhes pa stod cing gtor ma byin pas nges par bsrungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa stod cing gtor ma byin pas nges par bsrungs te /
translated: By praising her and giving her a torma, she will certainly protect you.

original: gong gi rdzas rnams dang bcas /
analyzed: gong gi rdzas rnams dang bcas /
translated: Together with the above substances,

original: rig sngags bstod pa gnyis gi wang gi chus gro ga la bris la mgul lam spyi bor gdags so //
analyzed: rig sngags bstod pa gnyis gi wang gi chus gro ga la bris la mgul lam spyi bor gdags so //
translated: Write the two praises of the knowledge mantra with guggulu resin on birch bark, and attach it to the neck or the head.

original: de yang sngon du khrus byas la gdags so //
analyzed: de yang sngon du khrus byas la gdags so //
translated: Moreover, it should be attached after bathing beforehand.

original: de su la btags pa'i 'gro ba de ni nam grus dpag tshad lnga bcu tshun chad srung bar byed do //
analyzed: de su la btags pa'i 'gro ba de ni nam grus dpag tshad lnga bcu tshun chad srung bar byed do //
translated: The person to whom this is attached will be protected from all directions within fifty yojanas.

original: byis pa gdon las thar bar byed pa'i bsgrub pa gsang ba me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: byis pa gdon las thar bar byed pa'i bsgrub pa gsang ba me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
translated: The Secret Accomplishment of the Fire Wheel for Releasing Children from Grahas

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of Ācārya Jñānavajra is complete.
